title: Manage Color Grading Session
description: A colorist needs access to the final edited sequence of a film to begin the color grading process.

tasks.description: Retrieve the final, picture-locked edit of the film from the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct version of the final edit.

tasks.description: Generate an Edit Decision List (EDL) from the sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully exports an EDL file.

tasks.description: Provide the colorist with the final sequence and the EDL file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely transfers the necessary files to the colorist.
